item.title: Basic Wireless LAN Security
item.description: Wireless-Security-Icon Although having a wireless LAN sounds like a wonderful idea, there are things that need to beÂ implemented like security. A wireless LAN can be uncontrollable has it is just radio waves and anybody can receive them. Having and using good security practices can help you be under control of your wireless LAN. Not having any security in a wireless LAN environment will cause anybody to have access to the network.
